context: Nepal ek chhoto tara vividha sanskritik desh ho. Yo desh char bhagoma bhaag garincha: Terai, Pahad, Himal, ra Madhesh. Pratyek bhag ko afno biseshta chha. Terai kshetra ma usko samathar bhag, moosam garmi, ra dhan ko kheti ma prasiddha chha. Yaha ka mancheharu madhya Nepali bhanda maithili, Bhojpuri jasto bhasha bolchhan. Pahad kshetra ko jagga ucha ra pahadiya chha, jun majorta kheti patika lagi chalchha. Yaha ka mancheharu Nepali bhasha bolchhan, ra khas ra Newar jasto jatiko rahan-sahan dekhinchha. Himal kshetra ma, jun Nepal ko uttari sima ho, Mahalangur, Annapurna, ra Kanchenjunga jasto Himal ra chiso thau chha. Yaha sherpa jasto jati ko basi ho, jun tourist guide ra mountaineering ma khasai jaanechhan. Madhesh, jun terai ra pahad ko bich ma chha, sahidharu ko thau jasto birgunj, Janakpur yaha chha. Nepal le apno pratibha sansar bhar chharko gareko ho, jasma Gautam Buddha ko janma thau Lumbini ra Sagarmatha (Mount Everest) ko thau jasto biswa prasiddha chha.
question: Nepal ma kun kun kshetra ko biseshta haru chha?
answer: Nepal ma char kshetra chhan: Terai dhan ko kheti ma prasiddha ho, Pahad kheti patika lagi uchit chha, Himal mountaineering ra tourist guide ma janne Sherpa ko ghar ho, ra Madhesh sahidharu ra maithili Sanskritik thau ho.

context: Nepal ko itihas dherai purano ra samriddha chha. Yaha kai 1768 ma Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal lai ekikaran garna suru gare. Tyo bela Nepal bhanda dherai chhoto desh thiyo, ra rajyaharuma bibhajit thiyo. Shah bamsa ko suruwat unai le gareko ho, ra unai le ‘Nepal ek fulbari ho’ bhanda jati jati ko samanwai ko mahatwa samjhae. Rana shashan ko kaal (1846 dekhi 1951) dherai kusto ra nirankush thiyo, jaha mancheharu lai swatantra bolne adhikar samma thien. 1950 ko kranti pachhi, Nepal le prajatantrik vyavastha ko shuruwat gareko ho, ra naya sambidhan le ek nauya ra loktantrik Nepal ko rooprekha prastut gareko chha. Aaj Nepal ek loktantrik ganatantra ho, jun 2008 ma rajtantra ko antim ra anti ho. Nepal ko rajnitik itihas ko ek arko rochak pahilu sambidhan tyo ho jasma chaar thulathula andolan haru le anek nyaya ko maang garne chhan. Nepal ko mahatwapurna itihas ko aro bhag Gautam Buddha ko janma thau Lumbini ra Kathmandu Upatyaka ma pareko dherai prachin devakutiko avashesh ho, jasma UNESCO World Heritage Sites jasto Swayambhunath ra Pashupatinath sammalit chhan.
question: Nepal ko rajnitik itihas ma kun kun bisesh ghatna haru chhan?
answer: Nepal ko rajnitik itihas ma Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal lai ekikaran garna suru gareko, Rana shashan ko nirankush kaal, 1950 ko kranti, ra 2008 ma rajtantra samapti hunu bisesh ghatna haru hun.

context: Sagarmatha (Mount Everest) sansar ko sabai bhanda uchcho chuchuro ho, jun Nepal ra Tibet ko sima ma chha. Isko uchai 8,848.86 meter ho, jun puri sansar ma sabai bhanda unnat thau ho. 1953 ma Sir Edmund Hillary ra Tenzing Norgay Sherpa le pahilo patak Sagarmatha chadna safal bhaye. Yaha har saal hajaaro touristharu trek garna ra Sagarmatha chadne prayas garna aunchhan. Sagarmatha National Park ma dherai jibiwan haru paine chhan, jasto ki himchituwa, himali bhalu, ra dherai thul-thul bird species. Isko manorama drishya ra Himal ko sundarta le tourist haru ma mahan akarshan bancha. Yaha ko Sherpa samuday, jasko mahan mountaineering gyan chha, Sagarmatha region ma basai garna chhan. UNESCO le 1979 ma Sagarmatha National Park lai World Heritage Site ko rup ma sammalit gareko chha.
question: Sagarmatha ko mahatwa kina chha?
answer: Sagarmatha sansar ko sabai bhanda uchcho chuchuro ho, Sir Edmund Hillary ra Tenzing Norgay Sherpa le pahilo patak chadeko, UNESCO World Heritage Site ma sammalit, ra isko himali jibiwan ra drishya le isko mahatwa chha.

context: Gautam Buddha ko janma thau Lumbini, Rupandehi jilla ma chha. Yaha kai 623 BC ma Buddha ko janma bhaeko thiyo. Lumbini UNESCO World Heritage Site ho, ra yaha har saal hajaaro dharmik yatri haru aune garne chhan. Lumbini ma Mayadevi Mandir, Ashoka Stambha, ra anek prachin Bihar haru chhan. Buddha ko ahimsa ra shanti ko sandesh le Lumbini lai biswa ma charchit thau banayeko chha.
question: Lumbini ko mahatwa kina chha?
answer: Lumbini Gautam Buddha ko janma thau ho, UNESCO World Heritage Site ho, ra yaha dharmik tathya haru jasto ki Mayadevi Mandir ra Ashoka Stambha chhan.

question: Pokhara ma tourist haru le ke ke garna sakchhan?

context: Pokhara ko Fewa Taal Nepal ko duisro sabai bhanda thulo taal ho. Yo taal ko chheuma tal barahi mandir chha, jun taal bhitra ko ek chhoto tapu ma sthit chha.
question: Fewa Taal ma ke prasiddha chha?
answer: Fewa Taal ma Tal Barahi Mandir prasiddha chha, jun taal bhitra ko tapu ma chha.

context: Nepal ko rajdhani Kathmandu ho, jun 1,400 meters ko uchai ma pareko chha. Kathmandu Upatyaka UNESCO World Heritage Site ko rup ma famous chha, jaha 7 ota world heritage monuments chhan.
question: Kathmandu ma kati ota world heritage monuments chhan?
answer: Kathmandu ma 7 ota world heritage monuments chhan.

context: Tilicho Taal, Mustang ma pareko, samundra talbata 4,919 meters ma sthit chha, ra yo duniya ko sabai bhanda uchai ma pareko taal ho. Trekkers haru le Annapurna Circuit ko trekking gardai yo taal herna sakchhan.
question: Tilicho Taal ko uchai kasto chha?
answer: Tilicho Taal ko uchai 4,919 meters chha.

context: Nepal ko janda ma sun ra chandra dekhinchha, jun Nepal ko laingik ra anantata ko pratik ho. Yo dunia ko ekmatra non-rectangular janda ho.
question: Nepal ko janda kina anokha chha?
answer: Nepal ko janda dunia ko ekmatra non-rectangular janda ho, ra sun ra chandra ko pratik chha.

context: Lhosar, Tamang ra Gurung samudaya ko naya barsa ho, jun Falgun ma manincha. Lhosar ma naach, bhajan, ra anek parikar ko khas anand linu huncha.
question: Lhosar kun samudaya le manauchhan?
answer: Lhosar Tamang ra Gurung samudaya le manauchhan.

context: Kaligandaki Nadi, Dhaulagiri ra Annapurna Himal ko bich ma bagne ek prasiddha nadi ho. Yo duniya ko sabai bhanda gahiro George (Andha Galchhi) ko lagi famous chha.
question: Kaligandaki Nadi kina prasiddha chha?
answer: Kaligandaki Nadi duniya ko sabai bhanda gahiro George ko lagi prasiddha chha.

context: Nepal ma 125 ota jati haru ra 123 ota bhasha bolincha. Sabai bhanda dherei boline bhasha Nepali ho, jun karib 44.6% le bolchan.
question: Nepal ma kati ota bhasha bolincha?
answer: Nepal ma 123 ota bhasha bolincha.

context: Gautam Buddha, jasko janma 623 BC ma Lumbini ma bhayeko thiyo, duniya lai shanti ko sandesh diyeko ek mahan dharmik guru ho. Unle 'Madhyam Marg' siksha diyeka thiye.
question: Gautam Buddha le ke sandesh diyeka thiye?
answer: Gautam Buddha le shanti ra 'Madhyam Marg' ko sandesh diyeka thiye.

context: Pashupatinath Mandir, Kathmandu ma pareko, Shiva Bhagwan ko ek prasiddha mandir ho, jun UNESCO World Heritage Site ma sammilit chha. Maha Shivaratri ko bela ma yaha lakhau bhakta aauchhan.
question: Pashupatinath Mandir ma ko ko bhakta aauchhan?
answer: Pashupatinath Mandir ma Shiva Bhagwan ka bhakta aauchhan, khas garera Maha Shivaratri ko bela.

context: Nepal ma 8 ota out of 14 world ko 8,000 meters bhanda mathi ko chuchura chhan. Yaha Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, ra Makalu jasto chuchura chhan, jun climbers ko lagi prasiddha chhan.
question: Nepal ma kati ota 8,000 meters mathi ko chuchura chhan?
answer: Nepal ma 8 ota 8,000 meters mathi ko chuchura chhan.

context: Sagarmatha National Park, Solukhumbu ma pareko ek UNESCO World Heritage Site ho. Yo park snow leopard, red panda, ra Himalayan tahr ko habitat ho.
question: Sagarmatha National Park ma kun kun animals dekhna milchha?
answer: Sagarmatha National Park ma snow leopard, red panda, ra Himalayan tahr dekhna milchha.

context: Swayambhunath Stupa, Kathmandu ma pareko ek aitihasik stupa ho, jun 'Monkey Temple' ko rup ma pani chincha. Isko oldest parts karib 2,000 barsa purana ho.
question: Swayambhunath Stupa kina 'Monkey Temple' ko rup ma chincha?
answer: Swayambhunath Stupa ma thuprai bander haru baschhan, tesaile yo 'Monkey Temple' ko rup ma chincha.

context: Narayan Gopal, Nepali sangeet ko 'Swar Samrat' ho, jasko geet haru ajha pani manchheharu ko man ma bascha. Unle 'Euta Manche Ko Maya' ra 'Yo Samjhine Man Cha' jasto prasiddha geet gae.
question: Narayan Gopal lai kehi geet ko naam dinus?
answer: Narayan Gopal ka prasiddha geet haru 'Euta Manche Ko Maya' ra 'Yo Samjhine Man Cha' hun.

context: Rhododendron, Nepal ko rashtriya phool ho, jun 3,000 meters mathi ko kshetra ma paine chha. Rhododendron ko vivid rang haru trekking routes lai sundar banaucha.
question: Nepal ko rashtriya phool ko naam ke ho?
answer: Nepal ko rashtriya phool Rhododendron ho.

context: Mithila art, Madhesh Pradesh ma sthit, prachin Nepali painting style ho, jun dharmik ra sanskritik kathaharulai rangin design ma prasthut garcha. Yo art bises garera Lumbini ra Janakpur ma dherai popular chha.
question: Mithila art Nepal ko kun kshetra ma popular chha?
answer: Mithila art Madhesh Pradesh, bises garera Lumbini ra Janakpur ma popular chha.

context: Baraha Chhetra, Sunsari ma pareko ek pavitra dharmik thau ho, jun Baraha Bhagwan ko mandir ko lagi prasiddha chha. Koshi Nadi ko kinara ma sthit, yo thau Hindu dharma ko manusmriti ma mahatwapurna chha.
question: Baraha Chhetra ma ke dekhna sakchha?
answer: Baraha Chhetra ma Baraha Bhagwan ko mandir ra Koshi Nadi ko drishya dekhna sakchha.

context: Kalapatthar, Everest Base Camp trekking route ma pareko ek viewpoint ho, jaha bata Everest ko sabai bhanda ramro drishya dekhna milchha. Yo spot photographers ra trekkers ko lagi paradise jasto chha.
question: Kalapatthar kina prasiddha chha?
answer: Kalapatthar Everest ko ramro drishya dekhna ko lagi prasiddha chha.

context: Nepal ko Rashtriya Gaan 'Sayaun Thunga Phoolka' byakul Maila (Pradeep Kumar Rai) le lekhiyeko ho. Yo gaan 2007 ma officially national anthem ko rup ma ghosit bhayeko thiyo.
question: Nepal ko Rashtriya Gaan ko lekhak ko naam ke ho?
answer: Nepal ko Rashtriya Gaan ko lekhak byakul Maila (Pradeep Kumar Rai) ho.
